data.persona: We are full of sin.  The cleric will save us.  We must repent.
data.description:
You are in the Priest's chambers.
The priest's chambers is archaic and mysterious. Religious idols and symbols line the walls of the chambers. White cloth and drapes hang from the ceilings.
There's a cloth and drape, an idol, and a cross here.
The the priest is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a clothing and a King's clothing.
